mean_cn: n. 定义，释义；（轮廓等）清晰
mean_en: an explanation of the meaning of a word or phrase, especially in a dictionary; the act of stating the meanings of words and phrases
sentence: This word has been given a new definition.
sentence_trans: 这个词被赋予了一个新的定义。
word_etyma: de使…成为 + fin界限 + ition名词后缀 → 划出界限 → 定义
